item.title: Hello world!
item.description: As a software developer there is only 1 title you can use to create your first post on a new blog. “Hello World!”. ðŸ‘‹ So why this blog? It’s actually my 3rd blog website I created. I started of years ago with a blog using Wordpress that I hosted myself. Then about 6 years ago I was working a lot with Azure and wanted to move away from self hosting so I created a new blog (still using Wordpress) but then hosted on Azure.
